code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import moment from"moment";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Summery(){const[appointments,setAppointments]=useState([]);console.log(appointments);useEffect(()=>{async function fetchAppointments(){const response=await fetch("/summery");const data=await response.json();setAppointments(data);}fetchAppointments();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{padding:'5px',borderBottom:'2px solid black'},children:" Appointments Summery"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ol",{children:appointments.map(appt=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{style:{padding:'5px',borderBottom:'2px solid black'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("b",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:appt.title})," "]})," - ",moment(appt.start).format("LLLL")]},appt.id))})]});}export default Summery;
